homepage.hero_subtitle: Upload your medical reports and get instant, comprehensive analysis with personalized insights. Our advanced technology helps you understand your health data like never before.
homepage.feature_1_desc: Get comprehensive analysis of your health reports in seconds using advanced OCR technology.
homepage.feature_2_desc: Your health data is encrypted and protected with enterprise-grade security. We never store your reports.
homepage.feature_3_desc: Support for various report formats including PNG, JPEG, JPG images and scanned documents.
homepage.available_247_desc: Access your health insights anytime, anywhere with our cloud-based platform
homepage.trend_tracking_desc: Monitor your health metrics over time and identify important trends in your medical data
homepage.how_it_works_desc: Get insights from your health reports in three simple steps
homepage.step_1_desc: Simply drag and drop your health report or take a photo with your device
homepage.step_2_desc: Our advanced technology processes and analyzes your report data in real-time
homepage.step_3_desc: Receive detailed analysis with explanations and recommendations
homepage.cta_title: Ready to Understand Your Health Better?
homepage.cta_desc: Join thousands of users who trust Health Report Analyzer for their medical insights. Start your journey to better health understanding today.
homepage.platform_desc: Transform complex medical data into clear, actionable insights with our cutting-edge platform

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.upload_first: Upload your first medical report to get started

reports.drag_drop: Drag and drop your medical report here
reports.supported_formats: Supported formats: PDF, JPG, PNG, JPEG

contact.subject: Subject
contact.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.
contact.form_notice: Working Email Service: Your message will be sent directly to our team via email.
contact.feedback_question: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the AI analyze my medical report?
faq.a1: The AI processes your uploaded medical report to extract key data and summarize findings in easy-to-understand language.
faq.a2: Yes, all uploads are encrypted during transfer and not stored on our server. Your privacy is our top priority.
faq.a3: You can upload PDF, JPEG, or PNG files up to 10 MB in size.
faq.a4: Typically under 15 seconds, depending on report size.
faq.a5: No. The tool provides AI-powered summaries only; for any medical advice, consult a professional.
